result.purpose: Provides common utilities and constants used across the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating common functionalities and constants to promote code reuse and maintainability.

internal/commons/address.go.purpose: Converts a hexadecimal hash string to a lowercase Ethereum address.

internal/commons/constant.go.purpose: Defines constants used across the application for authentication, date formatting, file handling, and API versioning.

internal/commons/date.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for date manipulation in UTC.
